Package com.example.ihuntwithjavalins.Player

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.ihuntwithjavalins.Player.PlayerController
  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods that perform action on or using the Player model class throughout the code Design Patterns: observer pattern - OnCompleteListener used to notify the caller of an operation when it is complete factory pattern - PlayerDB object created in the constructor template pattern - sortPlayers method is a template singleton pattern - implementation of the DBConnection class chain of responsibility pattern - ComparisonChain class from Google Guava library

      • getRanking

        public java.lang.String getRanking​(Player user,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerList,
                                   java.lang.String wordBrake,
                                   java.lang.String rankType)
        Gets the ranking of the user compared to other players in the playerList
        Parameters:
        user - the user playing the app
        playerList - list of players to compare user to
        wordBrake - string which is modified to display ranking
        rankType - string representing how to compare user with others
        Returns:
        string containing user ranking info

        Parameters:
        players - the list of players to search through
        query - the string which will be searched for in player data
        type - string representing where to search for query in player data
        Returns:
        list of players who contain the query
